item.title: Change Kitty terminal color-scheme
item.description: One of the more persistant complaints about the Kitty terminal emulator is the inability to reload configuration. While you can’t change every option at runtime, you can change most display properties on fly if you enable remote control first. After this small tweak you can change color schemes, window padding, and font sizes on demand in a single, or all windows; current, and future. ‚ùØ kitty @ --help Usage: kitty @ [options] command .
